name: ff-download-cleaner
description: Removes all entries from the ominous download history that has been there since Firefox 13. Removal can be set to occur on exit and/or in regular intervals. Icons are courtesy of August Interactive and Smashing Magazine.
author: Daniel Betz

preferences.name: clearOnExit
preferences.title: Clear downloads on exit
preferences.description: Delete download history when closing Firefox.

preferences.name: clearOnInterval
preferences.title: Clear downloads at intervals
preferences.description: Clear download list at regular intervals while Firefox is running.

preferences.name: clearInterval
preferences.title: Time interval
preferences.description: Interval for clearing the list. Only used when interval clearing is active. Unit is minutes. Values below 1 will disable the function.
